urls.title: United States COVID - Coronavirus Statistics - Worldometer
urls.description: United States Coronavirus update with statistics and graphs: total and new cases, deaths per day, mortality and recovery rates, current active cases, recoveries, trends and timeline.

text: Be your own best reporter -- look at the numbers. That a state like Va. (58 deaths per million) doesn't smartly begin reopening schools and businesses is a travesty. Gov. @RalphNortham  is destroying the commonwealth. https://t.co/TUQAhU7o97
